law.catch_line: Certification requirements of sponsor of sponsored captive insurer.
law.text: A sponsor of a sponsored captive insurer shall be an insurer licensed under the laws of any state, a reinsurer authorized or approved under the laws of any state, or a captive insurer formed or issued a certificate of authority under KRS 304.49-010 to 304.49-230. A risk retention group shall not be either a sponsor or a participant of a sponsored captive insurer.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 434, sec. 20, effective July 14, 2000.
